TopicTitle: Chronicles of the Kitty Space Program: Boldly seeking Space Tuna and unfurling Intergalactic Yarn

Articles.Content:
Inspired by the audacious successes of "little green men" of the Kerbal Space Program, a group of well-furred aristo-cats have begun funding for the Kitty Space Program.

Please welcome your new feline overlords as they ship their first space-going vessel, the CSS Kitty Hawk, to the KSC for testing.

Javascript is disabled. View full album

Oh wow!

Cats!

Run!

I'm allergic!

And yet I still love them so much.

Meow Meow Meow, Purr.

*Translated to Kerbal*

Weom Weom Weom, Rrup.

*Translated to English*

I wish you luck, Cats!

The Cat UFO and Scout Cat models are by Tim Yam, and can be downloaded from here:

http://kerbal.curseforge.com/ksp-mods/229570-the-meow-lander
